item.title: Social Media
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[h2]Social Media Boxes[/h2] [div-line] [toggle title="Social Media Boxes | Grab Shortcode" fold="false"][code width="100%" background="#ffffff"][one-third title="Facebook"][fb-box appId="373470946049453" user="CuckooThemes" show_stream="false"][/one-third][one-third title="Twitter"][twitter-list twitter_id="cuckoothemes" how_many="3"][/one-third][one-third last="true" title="Flickr"][flickr flickr_id="79295992@N08" count="9"][/one-third][/code][/toggle] [text-box width="100%" align="center" background]Facebook Box, Twitter Box and Flickr Box shortcodes allow you to display your social media content in CuckooTap theme CuckooTap theme does not support widgets, that’s why we created few usefull social media shortcodes to fill this gap. From now, CuckooTap V1.9 theme users can add Facebook Box, Twitter Box and Flickr Box. Each Social Media box can be customized by editing its shortcode. How to add Social Media Box shortcodes to your homepage? If you want to add these shortcodes to your homepage, create a new page and enter Social Media Box shortcodes you want. If you want to have all Social media boxes of the same width, looking like widgets, we recommend using columns for it. Then, publish this page, go to Homepage Builder and add this page as page unit to your homepage. That’s it.[/text-box] [one-third title="Facebook"][fb-box appId="373470946049453" user="CuckooThemes" show_stream="false"][/one-third][one-third title="Twitter"][twitter-list twitter_id="cuckoothemes" how_many="3"][/one-third][one-third last="true" title="Flickr"][flickr flickr_id="79295992@N08" count="9"][/one-third] [div-line] [h2]Social Media Shortcodes[/h2] [div-line] [toggle title="Social Media Buttons | Grab Shortcode" fold="false"][code width="100%" background="#ffffff"][h5]Facebook Like Button[/h5] [fb appId="462868073776406" layout="button_count"] [h5]Twitter Share Button[/h5] [twitter-share text="Share this on Twitter" countbox="horizontal"] [h5]Twitter Follow Button[/h5] [twitter-follow user="cuckoothemes"] [h5]Google Plus Share Button[/h5] [gplus] [h5]Pinterest Create Button[/h5] [pin-create] [h5]Pinterest Follow Button[/h5] [pin-follow user="Your Name" size="medium"] [h5]Pinterest Market Button[/h5] [pin-market][/code][/toggle] [h5]Facebook Like Button[/h5] [fb appId="462868073776406" layout="button_count"] [h5]Twitter Share Button[/h5] [twitter-share text="Share this on Twitter" countbox="horizontal"] [h5]Twitter Follow Button[/h5] [twitter-follow user="cuckoothemes"] [h5]Google Plus Share Button[/h5] [gplus] [h5]Pinterest Create Button[/h5] [pin-create] [h5]Pinterest Follow Button[/h5] [pin-follow user="Your Name" size="medium"] [h5]Pinterest Market Button[/h5] [pin-market] [div-line] [toggle title="Social Media Boxes | Grab Shortcode" fold="false"][code width="100%" background="#ffffff"][h5]Social Box Horizontal[/h5]
